reviewText:
This CODEFREE DVD Box set contains the fist 4 6th Doctor Adventures:

- Zweimal Einstein (Twin Dilemma)
- Angriff der Kybermänner (Attack of the Cybermen)
- Revolte auf Varos (Vengeance on Varos)
- Die Rache des Meisters (The Mark of the Rani)

and of course the complete Bonus Material plus a lovely introduction written by Colin Baker.

Sound: English and German
Subtitles: English (HI) and German
Region Code: 0
